overview: An original illustrated 110 minute recording by The Pythons of their early screenplay in progress.
tagline: On 15th July 1977 Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones and Michael Palin went in to a studio in London to record a read-through of the draft screenplay for their new film "Monty Python's Life of Brian"
title: Life Of Brian Screenplay
